alert.note: Alert for Benton; Iowa (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 11:05PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Benton and north central Iowa Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1104 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Keystone, or 14 miles southwest of Vinton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Vinton, Belle Plaine, Urbana, Dysart, Shellsburg, Newhall, Blairstown, Van Horne, Keystone, Norway, Garrison, Mount Auburn, Luzerne, Vinton Memorial Airport, Rodgers Park, Benton City Park, Hoefle-Dulin Park, Hannen Lake Park, Watkins and Benton County Fairgrounds. This includes Interstate 380 between mile markers 43 and 45. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.
